name: Eradicating PSN Command and Control Positions
description: Tactical methods to remove PSNs from key leadership, governance, and operational roles.

cards.title: Identifying Critical PSN Power Nodes
cards.description: Mapping out the hierarchy of PSN influence in corporate, governmental, and societal structures.
bulletpoints: Tracking connections between PSN-controlled executives, officials, and enforcers.
Identifying covert alliances and funding sources keeping them in power.
Pinpointing weak links in their power chain that can be leveraged for collapse.

cards.title: Creating Leadership Vacuums
cards.description: Strategically destabilizing PSN leadership structures without direct confrontation.
bulletpoints: Using insider leaks to expose corruption and force resignations.
Triggering public distrust through subtle narrative manipulation.
Orchestrating systemic audits and legal battles to remove key figures.

cards.title: Psy-Ops and Psychological Dismantling
cards.description: Forcing PSN leaders into mental and emotional instability to weaken their control.
bulletpoints: Amplifying their paranoia by creating false signals of betrayal within their own ranks.
Feeding them disinformation that forces reckless decision-making.
Breaking their confidence by orchestrating controlled failures in their initiatives.
